DocLocalization.Name: Personne agissant au nom d'une organisation

DocAttribute.Name: ThePerson
DocAttribute.Documentation: The person who is related to the organization.

DocAttribute.Name: TheOrganization
DocAttribute.Documentation: The organization to which the person is related.

DocAttribute.Name: Roles
DocAttribute.Documentation: Roles played by the person within the context of an organization. These may differ from the roles in _ThePerson.Roles_ which may be asserted without organizational context.
